trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i possibili allineamenti per la visualizzazione degli elementi di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile controllare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout scegliendo uno dei membri di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Layout di stack

trans-unit.source: Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Stacking è la disposizione di elementi adiacenti a entrambe le estremità del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: Nell'elenco seguente vengono descritti i layout di stack.

trans-unit.source: StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: StackWithOverflow è il valore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Questa impostazione determina il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> per modificare il layout automaticamente in base al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> proprietà per gestire il trascinamento e scenari di ancoraggio.

trans-unit.source: VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering VerticalStackWithOverflow il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> elementi accanto a altro in senso verticale.

trans-unit.source: HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering HorizontalStackWithOverflow il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> elementi accanto a altro in senso orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Altre funzionalità di layout di Stack

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> Determina la fine di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> a cui l'elemento viene allineato.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando gli elementi non corrispondono all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, viene automaticamente visualizzato un pulsante di overflow.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> impostazione della proprietà determina se un elemento viene visualizzato nell'area di riversamento sempre, in base alle esigenze, o mai.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato inserito nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, l'overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, o se non viene visualizzato affatto.

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Le cause comuni per cui non viene visualizzato un elemento sono che l'elemento non è contenuto principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> e il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> è stata impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Rendere una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> mobile inserendolo un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> e impostando il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options
trans-unit.target: Altre opzioni di Layout

trans-unit.source: The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: Le altre opzioni di layout sono flusso e la tabella.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout
trans-unit.target: Layout di flusso

trans-unit.source: Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Layout di flusso è il valore predefinito per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È simile al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Come indicato di seguito sono riportate le funzionalità di layout di flusso:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le funzionalità di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> esposte dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: È necessario eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> classe per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> proprietà nel codice per allineare gli elementi all'interno della riga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> viene ignorata.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato inserito nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> o eccessive.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: Riquadro di ridimensionamento non viene eseguito e pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> nello stile di layout di flusso in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> non può essere spostato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> pulsante di overflow non viene eseguito, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> viene ignorato.

trans-unit.source: Table Layout
trans-unit.target: Layout di tabella

trans-unit.source: Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Layout di tabella è il valore predefinito per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È simile a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Come indicato di seguito sono riportate le funzionalità di layout di tabella:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le funzionalità di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> esposte dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: È necessario eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> classe per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> proprietà nel codice per allineare gli elementi all'interno della cella di tabella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> viene ignorata.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> proprietà per determinare se un elemento è stato inserito nella classe principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> o eccessive.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: Riquadro di ridimensionamento non viene eseguito e pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> nello stile di layout di tabella in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> non può essere spostato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> pulsante di overflow non viene eseguito, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> viene ignorato.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica la fluttuazione orizzontale o verticale degli elementi.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti orizzontalmente e in overflow, se necessario.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che gli elementi vengono disposti verticalmente, allineati al centro all'interno del controllo e in overflow, se necessario.
